None.Name: Tainted Speed-up
None.Description:
Activate to
accelerate the construction time of
all buildings placed in the current
game. Every friendly building played
out will be nearly instantly
constructed but will also
immediately lose 400 life points.
Lasts for, 15 seconds. Reusable every
60 seconds.
